notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: The manuscript was written through the contribution of all the authors. M.O., S.B.Z., J.W., and E.U. designed and conceptualized the study. M.O. collected the plant specimen and isolated the fungal endophytes. M.O., H.B., J.W., M.Z., E.U., A.P.-R., and J.J.C. collected analytical chemistry data. All the authors performed data analyses and have approved the final version of the manuscript.
